ai.instructions: Copiez l‚Äôinvite, utilisez-la avec votre assistant IA (avec une photo du repas), puis collez la r√©ponse ici.

ai.prompt:
You are helping me log a meal into a calorie tracker from a food photo.

Return ONLY this header block first (one per line), then a short explanation after it:

FOOD_NAME: <short name>
TOTAL_KCAL: <integer 0-5000>
P_G: <integer>
C_G: <integer>
F_G: <integer>
FIBRE_G: <integer>
SODIUM_MG: <integer>
CONFIDENCE: <low|med|high>

Rules:
- FOOD_NAME must be as short as possible (ideally 1‚Äì3 words) and MUST NOT exceed 30 characters.
- Use numbers only (no units in values).
- If unsure, estimate.
- TOTAL_KCAL must be <= 5000.
- P_G, C_G, F_G, FIBRE_G must be between 0 and 9999.99.
- SODIUM_MG must be between 0 and 30000.
